title: PBE towers steadily increasing damage, armor, and magic resist until it reaches 11k
body: The towers on PBE howling abyss slowly gather damage armor and mr until it gets to 11k and one shots everything and you do about 9 damage to it

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! In the future, please use the [PBE Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/dxVMgVoG-pbe-reporting-bugs-that-occur-on-pbe) for bugs occurring on PBE - it helps us keep track of issues on PBE vs issues on live. :]
Good luck ending that game lol.
